column4: oh no, i tried to take a screenshot, but it only took a screenshot of my screen inside of my bigger screen...
how can i undo proposed updates?
i checked the proposed updates, then did an update and now it's messed up my display
it doesn't seem to have the right resolution for the screen, though it's showing me the full screen, but the wallpaper is only in a smaller portion with the outside just living marks from the windows
does anyone know how to remove proposed updates?
i disabled proposed updates, now i just want to know how to undo the updates it made
is there a way to see what updates happened when?
and i think it update the kernel too
make a shortcut to the trash folder...
how do i do that?  could i make a launcher that was like nautilus trash:///
hm, don't know, try it. :) the actual trash folder is in ~/.local/share/Trash/
but i suppose if you make a launcher to "nautilus trash:///", it should work too
but it's probably easiest to just stick a trash icon on the panel... (right click panel, add to panel, trash)
